messages.subject: Rurouni Kenshin/Shinsengumi Doujinshi
messages.msgSnippet: Hello everyone,  I hope you won t mind this shameless plug, but my partner Eeni has embarked on an ambitious project to make an English-language doujinshi out
messages.messageBody:
Hello everyone, 

I hope you won't mind this shameless plug, but my partner Eeni has embarked on an ambitious project to make an English-language doujinshi out of a Rurouni Kenshin fanfiction I wrote. We have set up a tumblr blog in order to showcase our work, and we would be extremely grateful for any help we can get in promoting it. If you could possibly check it out, and if you like it, give us a shout-out on your website, we'd be thrilled. We really hope you enjoy it and can spread the love - it was a lot of work, if I may say so myself. Eeni spent weeks working on the first two chapters. 

The fic itself is "The Courtship of Lady Tokio". The links are here: 

Tumblr: http://meijikeikanromantan.tumblr.com 
Doujinshi: http://meijikeikanromantan.tumblr.com/tagged/CLT-doujinshi 
New fanfic: http://www.fanfiction.net/s/8593839/1/Meiji-Keikan-Romantan 
http://meijikeikanromantan.tumblr.com/tagged/Meiji-Keikan-Romantan 

Please let us know what you think - your candid opinion would be very much appreciated! 

Thank you so much in advance, 

M & Eeni 

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: Confirmed: Discovered Scroll is by Kondo Isami
messages.msgSnippet: That s pretty cool. I didn t know that Kondou did that to repay people for borrowed money. I thought that Serizawa and others just took what they wanted when
messages.messageBody:
That's pretty cool. I didn't know that Kondou did that to repay people for borrowed money. I thought that Serizawa and others just took what they wanted when they wanted it.

-Bunneh

messages.subject: Confirmed: Discovered Scroll is by Kondo Isami
messages.msgSnippet: Recently found handwritten scroll of Japanese swordsman (Kondo Isami) discusses heroism A calligraphy scroll, handwritten by the renowned 19th Century Japanese
messages.messageBody:
Recently found handwritten scroll of Japanese swordsman (Kondo Isami) discusses heroism

A calligraphy scroll, handwritten by the renowned 19th Century Japanese swordsman, Isami Kondo, had been recently found in the city of Kyoto, it was revealed.

*** To conclude: You sponsor the Shinsengumi you get some nice calligraphy :P

http://mdn.mainichi.jp/arts/news/20111005p2a00m0na003000c.html
